title: Wow, I think I just figured it out.
body:
So I get banned for a bunch of various cheating offenses and it offends the majority of GD is for one of two reasons.

Reason 1 is that I am a cheater, and even though I am. I still am the best player on the board as I can get D2 in a week without any runes or heroes on stream. So the typical cheater is still better than you guys.

Reason 2 is you are wrong and I am innocent. This is something I imagine a lot of GDers having trouble with, not only they will be wrong... but their infallible Riot overlords as well.

So just my presence pisses you off, it's pretty great.
